data.title: Bipasha Basu to tie the knot with Karan Singh Grover on April 30
data.meta_description: Bipasha and Karan both released a joint statement breaking the news of their upcoming wedding to the media.
data.text:
Synopsis

Bipasha and Karan both released a joint statement breaking the news of their upcoming wedding to the media.

MUMBAI: Actress Bipasha Basu will be tying the knot with her beau actor Karan Singh Grover on April 30.

"We are happy to finally share the good news with everyone. 30th April 2016 is the big day and we cannot thank our family, friends, fans and well-wishers enough for all their love and support," a joint statement issued by both Bipasha and Karan read.

The wedding will be a private affair.

"Our deepest gratitude for respecting our privacy this far. We hope to have your continued blessings and warm wishes as we embark on this new journey together," it said.

Before dating Karan, Bipasha was in a relationship with actor Harman Baweja.

Bipasha Basu with Karan Singh Grover (Image: Instagram)

While this would be the actress' first marriage, Karan was previously married to TV stars Shraddha Nigam and Jennifer Winget.

Bipasha and Karan, 34, began dating after starring in 2015 horror film "Alone".

There were rumours that the pair, who have been dating for more than a year now, are getting married at the end of this month.

Extending her best wishes to the couple, Priyanka took to her Twitter page and wrote, "I'm truly so happy for my friend @bipsluvurself and her handsome bridegroom to be @Iamksgofficial You're a golden heart... you deserve so much and more."

While Priyanka and Bipasha, 37, have shared screen space in 2005 film "Barsaat", the "Quantico" actress hosted the third season of celebrity stunt-based show "Khatron Ke Khiladi" where Karan was a participant.

Also read: When the marriage happens, people will come to know: Bipasha Basu
